name: Made in Abyss
description: This anime is great. the plot is original, characters and great and easy to identify with, the art is stunning and the music is awesome. This anime deserves 10/10

name: ousama ranking
description: This anime is real masterpiece. From music to animation, everything is perfect. Characters are great, and well written, openings (especially second one) are catchy. Art style might confuse, but it is definitely not a show for kids.
